title: Waves Complete V9r27 OS X (Patch) [dada]
description:
Waves Complete V9r27 OS X (Patch) [dada]
1.25 GB

Tested only Audio Unit and VSTs.
Untested AAX/WPAPI
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------  <a href="
http://www.waves.com" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://www.waves.com</a>
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Featuring 64-bit support, faster scanning, faster loading, and faster processing, Waves Version 9 opens up new dimensions of high performance plugin power.

Waves V9r27 installers - May 11th, 2015

- The new H-Reverb available separately as well as in Mercury, Pro Show and SD7 Pro Show.
- Butch Vig Vocals now SoundGrid-compatible.
- Butch Vig Vocals: In/Out VU meters now properly represent L & R channels.
- Butch Vig Vocals: Fixed crash in a session with some 3rd party plugins.
- dbx 160: Closing the plugin GUI and reopening it no longer causes the preset name to change to "Preset A".
- dbx 160: Added support for AVID S3 and S6 control surfaces.
- dbx 160: Fixed hum noise frequency in stereo component to 50Hz instead of 100Hz.
- GTR ToolRack: Added external meters when inserted into StudioRack.
- GTR Solo now excluded from SoundGrid hosts.
- InPhase now added to SoundGrid hosts.
- IR-1, IR-L, IR360, IR-Live: Importing an IR from a long path now properly saved in the session.
- Manny Marroquin Plugins: Fixed a possible crash of the SoundGrid server.
- MetaFilter: Step Count no longer missing from the Automation List in Pro Tools and Smooth no longer appears twice.
- Renaissance Bass: Added external meters when inserted into StudioRack mono.
- Vitamin: Fixed missing right channel external meter when inserted into StudioRack.
- X-Crackle: Fixed processing at 96kHz.
- VST2.4: Added support for real-world values in automation lanes.
- Fixed various possible crashes and graphical problems in plugins with resizable GUIs.
- Fixed a problem where WaveShell-AAX may fail to load and is declared as an invalid AAX plugin.
- Fixed an issue where on Mac Yosemite the 'Save Preset' window will remain open after clicking OK.
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
INSTALLATION:
-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Uninstall previous version (V9r26):

Delete Waves folder:

Macintosh HD /Applications/Waves
Macintosh HD /Library/Application Support/Waves
Macintosh HD /Users/you_name/Library/Preferences/Waves Preferences

Delete Plug-Ins:

AU/VST/VST3/WPAPI/AAX

Macintosh HD /Library/Audio/Plug-Ins/Components/WaveShell-AU 9.3.component
Macintosh HD /Library/Audio/Plug-Ins/Components/WaveShell-AU 9.61.component
Macintosh HD /Library/Audio/Plug-Ins/VST/WaveShell-VST 9.3.vst
Macintosh HD /Library/Audio/Plug-Ins/VST/WaveShell-VST 9.61.vst
Macintosh HD /Library/Audio/Plug-Ins/VST3/WaveShell-VST3 9.3.vst3
Macintosh HD /Library/Audio/Plug-Ins/VST3/WaveShell-VST3 9.61.vst3
Macintosh HD /Library/Audio/Plug-Ins/WPAPI/WaveShell-WPAPI_1 9.3.bundle

Macintosh HD /Library/Application Support/Avid/Audio/Plug-Ins/WaveShell-AAX 9.3.aaxplugin
Macintosh HD /Library/Application Support/Avid/Audio/Plug-Ins/WaveShell-AAX 9.61.aaxplugin

Now install Waves Complete V9r27 (test AU/VST/VST3).

1. Install the products you want.
   To install all products, choose below:

- Mercury
- Abbey Road Collection
- SSL 4000 Collection
- GTR Solo (Optional. Full GTR is included in Mercury)
- WavesTune LT (Optional. Full WavesTune is included in Mercury)

Or_ Single Plug-Ins (click triangle to expand).

2. Run Patch.command with Terminal (Right ClickÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ Open WithÃ¢â‚¬Â¦ Terminal)
   (passwrd: you_passwrd_user)

3. Run Waves AU Reg Utility 9.3

4. Authorize and enjoy!
